p: Arboviral diseases are infections caused by viruses transmitted by arthropods, reported worldwide, especially in tropical climate areas [ 1, 2]. In recent decades, the arboviral diseases have had even greater repercussions due to the overwhelming spread and increased severity, leading to a higher number of deaths [ 3]. In Brazil, a predominantly tropical country, there are records of a wide variety of arboviral diseases [ 1, 4, 5, 6].
